content.title: Uses
content.description: Avenue tree. Grown for its beautiful red-coloured showy flowers. The plant is traditionally used to treat: inflammation, rheumatism, bronchitis, diabetes, anemia, fever, gynecological disorders, and pneumonia. It possesses antioxidant, hepatoprotective, gastroprotective, wound healing, antiarthritic, larvicidal, antimalarial, antiemetic, antibacterial, antifungal, antiinflammatory, analgesic, antidiarrhoeal, antiheamolytic, diuretic, and anthelmintic activities.
